snippet.title: Bastion - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing Bastion, an original action role-playing game that challenges players to build a safe haven from the ashes of a dying world.
Get Bastion on Switch: https://goo.gl/zptX5H
Get Bastion on Steam: http://bit.ly/nqyoJA

Get Bastion on PS4: http://bit.ly/1Fi7rcK

Get Bastion on XBLA: http://bit.ly/rqp6UV

Stream the Soundtrack, including this trailer's music at http://bit.ly/nPbJv7

Visit us at http://www.supergiantgames.com/
